name: Liberation Army
description:
Rebellion stirs in the Northern Provinces... rebellion led by you!

Liberation Army is a short narrative game culminating in a major battle in the style of the first Suikoden's large scale wars.  As with any game jam game, there's lots of cut content and lack of polish due to time constraints. Lovers of narrative games or Suikoden may nevertheless find enjoyment here.

To win at war:

  • charge beats skirmish
  • skirmish beats formation
  • formation beats charge

Requirements:

  • Windows 7+
  • A mouse
